thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: A & M Burke
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by A & M Burke

author: A & M Burke
title: A & M Burke
text: My online experience was fine until I realised that the football boots I ordered got lost. I contacted the helpline and a very nice guy called Jordan investigated and rang me back. My football boots could not be found and within one day a new order was placed and delivered to my door. Thank you Jordan for all you help.
